name: page-chauffeur
description: A cross browser library for writing functional tests using webdriver

scripts.test-int-all: npm run test-int && npm run test-int-ff && npm run test-int-chrome
scripts.coverage: mkdir -p ./target/unit; istanbul cover --report lcov --dir ./target/unit node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive -R spec test/unit
scripts.coverage-int: mkdir -p ./target/integration; istanbul cover --report lcov --dir ./target/integration node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -R spec --recursive test/integration/*Spec.js

author: Lawrence Carvalho
